EigenMeat.EigenMaze
Class EigenEngine

java.lang.Object
  EigenMeat.EigenMaze.EigenEngine
public class EigenEngine
extends java.lang.Object

This is the facade for the entire engine. It is a singleton, and provides simple methods to inject entities into the engine. It makes sure those entities get to where they need to be. It also provides some accessor functions for important objects.

Method Detail

instance

public static EigenEngine instance()
Gets the single existing instance of the engine.

Returns:
The engine instance.

connect

public void connect(boolean isServer,
                    java.lang.String ip,
                    int port)
Start a server or connect to a server for a net game. If isServer is true, ip will be disregarded, but port will be adhered to.

Parameters:
isServer - true if this game will be a server; false if it will be a client.
ip - the IP or hostname to connect to if this game is a client.
port - the port to host or connect on.

update

public void update()
Updates the state of the engine based on Game.tof.

add

public void add(Drawable entity)
Adds a Drawable to the engine. Its draw() method will be called every time the engine's display updates.

Parameters:
entity - the Drawable to add.
See Also:
DisplayHandler

add

public void add(MobileEntity entity)
Adds a MobileEntity to the engine. Its update() method will be called every time the engine's game world updates.

Parameters:
entity - the MobileEntity to add.

addNet

public void addNet(NetEntity entity)
Adds a NetEntity to the engine. As often as possible, it will be serialized and sent to all other clients in a net game.

Parameters:
entity - the NetEntity to add.
See Also:
NetHandler

netUpdate

public void netUpdate(NetEntity entity)
Updates the given NetEntity across all connections to the current game. This works only if the current entity has been added to the engine.

Parameters:
entity - the NetEntity to update.
See Also:
NetHandler

add

public void add(ParticleEffect peffect)
Adds a ParticleEffect to the engine.

Parameters:
peffect - the ParticleEffect to add.

addTriangles

public void addTriangles(EigenMeat.EigenMaze.Triangle[] triangles)
Adds Triangles to the engine's Octree. These triangles will both be drawn based on frustum and used for collision detection.

Parameters:
triangles - the array of Triangles to add.
See Also:
Octree

checkCollision

public void checkCollision(MobileEntity entity)
Checks to see if an entity is colliding with any triangles in the Octree. The Octree will take appropriate action on the entity if it is colliding.

Parameters:
entity - the MobileEntity to check against.
See Also:
Octree.checkCollision(MobileEntity)

generateOctree

public void generateOctree()
Generates the engine's static Octree.

See Also:
Octree.generate()

public Octree getOctree()
Gets the engine's static Octree.

Returns:
the engine's Octree.

setCameraTarget

public void setCameraTarget(float xCord,
                            float yCord,
                            float zCord)
Set the game world point at which the rendering camera points.

Parameters:
xCord - the x-coordinate of the point at which to look.
yCord - the y-coordinate of the point at which to look.
zCord - the z-coordinate of the point at which to look.

setCameraLocation

                              float yCord,
                              float zCord)
Set the rendering camera's game world position.

Parameters:
xCord - the x-coordinate of the camera location.
yCord - the y-coordinate of the camera location.
zCord - the z-coordinate of the camera location.
